text: KDOT (map legend) Stano is an unincorporated community in Grant County, Kansas, United States. It lies on the border of Sherman and Sullivan TownshipsCensus Bureau map, combined with county map at the intersection of the Cimarron Valley Railroad with Road C, 8 miles (13 km) west-southwest of the county seat of Ulysses.Official county map ==References== ==Further reading== ==External links== * Grant County Maps: Current, Historic, KDOT Category:Unincorporated communities in Grant County, Kansas Category:Unincorporated communities in Kansas
title: Stano, Kansas
